titleStmt.title: A true reporte of the great ouerthrowe lately giuen vnto the Spaniards, in their resolute assault of Bergen op Zoam, in the lowe countries

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. E[ld] and are to be sold by Iohn Hodgets at his shop in Pauls church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 1900a on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; lacks all after leaf B3.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
